message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM 

This paper proposes a new approach for metric learning, which is a common problem in machine learning and computer vision. The paper discusses the advantages of the proposed approach over existing methods and provides theoretical justification for the sparse combination. The empirical evaluation is conducted on several datasets, which suggests that the proposed approach outperforms state-of-the-art methods. Based on this, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also mentions the use of natural language processing techniques, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.MM (Multimedia).
